text: Omar Mahmoud Gaber (; born 30 January 1992) is an Egyptian footballer who plays for Egyptian Premier League side Zamalek and mainly as a right-back but also sometimes as a right midfielder. == Honours == === Club === ; Zamalek * Egyptian Premier League: 2014–15 * Egypt Cup: 2012–13, 2013–14, 2014–15 Basel * Swiss Super League: 2016–17 * Swiss Cup: 2016–17 === National team === ; Egypt * Africa Cup of Nations Runner-up: 2017 == References == Category:1992 births Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Living people Category:Egypt international footballers
title: Omar Gaber
